narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to create a basic accounting receipt
to be able to make accounting adjustments as needed

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Accounting accounts
As a Siigo Cloud user, I want to be able to create an accounting accounts at the level sub auxiliary
To confirm that it is created successful

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to create an accounting accounts at the level sub auxiliary
To confirm that it is created successful

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Close of year
As a Siigo Cloud user, I want to validate the accounting that generated the closing of the year
To confirm that it is correct.

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to create the annual closing accounting voucher
To validate the movement of accounts of income, expenses, costs of sale and cost of production

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Difference instead
As a customer I want to record the difference in exchange with cost center
to record the adjustment to a cost center.

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to record the difference in exchange with cost center
To validate the calculation of the difference in exchange and the creation of the voucher

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Difference instead
As a siigo user I want to make massive delete
To validate the delete of the different documents.

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to make massive delete
To validate the deleted of the different documents

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to make massive delete
To validate that the different documents do not deleted

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Magnetic media assistant
As a siigo user
I want to manage the configuration of the magnetic media formats and the magnetic media formats
To review that the reports will be generated in accordance with the requirements of the DIAN.

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to download the configuration of the magnetic media formats for 2020 and 2021
To review how the information recorded in the accounting will be generated in accordance with the requirements of the DIAN.

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to check the magnetic media assistant
in order to confirm that it is correct

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to configure the magnetic media formats
To generate the information recorded in the accounting records in accordance with the requirements of the DIAN

narrative.text:

to be able to have control of my account

narrative.text:

to be able to have control of my account

narrative.text:

narrative.text:
As a user of siigo
I want to create the accounting voucher for the closing of accounts by a third party
To validate the transfer of balances to DIAN

narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to register a Credit Note
To validate the correct creation of a Credit Note with the taxes on the product and with the Consortium management

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to cross reference an electronic sales invoice with an electronic credit note
To validate the creation of the electronic credit note with all the related sales invoice data

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Cash Receipt
As a customer I want to be able to create cash receipt in order to register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an cash receipt
in order to register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to cancel an cash receipt
in order to delete it's register value as advance

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an advanced cash receipt with Reteica Tax
in order to register my sales

children.displayName: Cash receipts with payment to invoice
children.name: Cash receipts with payment to invoice
children.id: Cash receipts with payment to invoice

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an cash receipt
in order to register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to edit an cash receipt
To record an changed in advance

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able delete an cash receipt
in order to delete it from my accounting

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Invoices sales
As a customer I want to be able to create invoice sales
In order to sell my products and register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an invoice electronic
In order to provide my incomes against the government entities

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an invoice with taxes
in order to register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an invoice without Taxes
in order to register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an invoice without Taxes
in order to register my sales

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Transactions
I want to create a transfer note between warehouses with valid values
To validate that it is saved with the information entered

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Transactions
I want to create a physical Count voucher with valid data
To validate that it is saved

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a Siigo cloud user
I want to create a physical Count voucher with valid data
To validate that it is saved

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
Assembly Note
As a customer I want to be able to create assembly note
to be able to use in the assembly note creation

narrative.name: Narrative
narrative.text:
As a siigo user
I want to be able to make an assembly note
in order to register my sales
